name: Shreeji Textiles
overview:
We are “Shreeji Textiles”, engaged in supplying and trading high quality range of High Quality Textiles. Established in the year 1992, we have been in the business of textiles manufacturing for over a decade. Our primary product categories include Flannel Cloth, Flannel Fabric and Flannel Duster which are in high demand across entire India.

Our Team: Business development Quality control managers Procurement staff Inventory and support staff

Our Quality: We adhere to strict quality controlled production environment. Over the time we have built our own set of quality assurance processes which are in line with the industry norms. We have quality teams who are entrusted with the task of ensuring good quality of sourcing raw materials, chemicals and dyes.

Our Infrastructure: Located in Indore, we are geographically close to important industrial hubs. As per the process operations requirement, we have created areas for processes like, raw material treatment, weaving, knitting, crocheting and knotting of threads into fabric. Apart from usual shops, we have a dedicated section for R&D, that handles the research into new fabrics, designs and combinations.

Clientele: As manufacturers and suppliers of high grade textiles, we have a host of corporate clients as our bulk customers, whereas our day to day relationships are with top distributors located in Surat, Mumbai, Ludhiana and other textile hubs.
